page_content: The page provides legal disclaimers and information about data processing.
The page discusses the Berner Kantonsverwaltung's decision to implement Microsoft 365 starting from 2024.

The page offers supervised recreational horse riding for children and teenagers at Schulheim Schloss Erlach.
The page provides detailed information about border points, their attributes, and how they are identified.
The page discusses flood protection measures taken by the Canton of Bern in collaboration with the municipality of Muri.
The page provides legal disclaimers and information about data processing for the Bildungscampus Burgdorf website.
The page provides information for companies about pre-apprenticeship programs and the registration process.
The page provides information on cultural vouchers and how they can be used to support cultural activities in schools.

The page discusses air emissions from agriculture and measures to reduce them.
